paragraphs.body: Something about off-wiki IRC doesn't work for me. It always says there's an error and I don't know why. Can we change it back to on-wiki? I can't use it otherwise. Or could there be another page for on-wiki? -- Dudewaldo4  My stories 22:29, July 25, 2010 (UTC)
